author: in
Darò, Carlotta: Nicolas Schöffer and the Cybernetic City

author: tag
Darò, Carlotta: sex + wissenschhaft + kontrast + konnotation + symbol + zeichen + orthogonal + rational + deduziert + deduktion + architektur + stadt + offenbarung + gutgläubig + interpretation + funktion + entwicklung + konsequenz + verteilung + diagrammatik + schema + aktivität

author: quote
Darò, Carlotta: Unlike sex, science is therefore orthogonal and rationally deduced. But in either case, architecture only ever reveals itself as the faithful interpretation of its function, while the city develops in consequence as the distribution of these architectures according to a diagrammatic schema of activities.
